function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding as a major obstacle to public compliance with emergency response measures","Impact":"Low compliance with emergency measures, leading to increased risk of disease spread","Mitigation":"Educational campaigns and communication strategies to improve understanding and compliance","Technologies":"Educational materials, media campaigns, and digital communication tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Changes in human behavior occur in three stages: knowledge acquisition, belief generation, and behavior formation","Impact":"Ineffective behavior formation due to lack of knowledge acquisition and belief generation","Mitigation":"Targeted education and awareness programs for each stage of behavior change","Technologies":"Behavior change communication strategies, educational materials, and targeted messaging","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health researchers, educators"},{"Description":"Lack of appropriate knowledge as a prerequisite for the public to take action","Impact":"Inaction or incorrect actions in response to infectious diseases, leading to increased risk of transmission","Mitigation":"Public education initiatives to provide accurate and timely information on infectious diseases","Technologies":"Online platforms, educational materials, and community engagement tools","People":"General public","Owner":"Public health authorities, educational institutions"}]}
